my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Wah, Si Gayut sedang bergayut riang di sana.

my.name: Alif
my.sentence: Dahan itu menyerupai huruf Hijaiyah. Tapi huruf apa iya?

my.name: Tuah
my.sentence: Dahan itu bergulung membentuk huruf 'Sin'. Sesuai Si Gayut bergayut riang.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: It looks like a Hijaiyah letter.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: But which letter could it be?

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Do you think you can help us figure it out?

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: That makes a lot of sense!

en.name: Tuah
en.sentence: Which makes it perfect for swinging around.

en.name: Alif
en.sentence: We've now found the first Hijaiyah letter for today.
